title: Riot and the 1000' games play
body:
Hi guys,

 I just had my 1004th win, (total just under 2000 games total) of un-ranked summoners rift, My buddy just told me about rioters playing with people who hit the 1000 games, but then said its only on the 1000th game, just wondering if it is a thing, i heard about it a long time ago but figured it was a myth. now that i'm one of those people, just wondering the story behind it, and if its real. or if anyone wants to play. it gets lonely out there :<.  

Thanks c:

replies.body: Ah man, this was an easier thing to do back when League was a smaller community but it's grown a lot since!  It's not something we really do these days, but Broporo and I try to play community games sometimes on Fridays.  Look for us to make a post about it around this same time!
Ah drat, Thanks anyway, ill have to try and catch one of these community games, thanks for getting back to me! c:
